text: General Sir Charles Richard Huxtable, KCB, CBE (22 July 1931 – 26 November 2018) was a senior British Army officer. He fought in the Korean War. He was Commander-in-Chief, Land Forces between 1988 and 1990. In the 1961 Queen's Birthday Honours, he was appointed Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE). Huxtable died on 26 November 2018 at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Duke of Wellington's Regimental Website – Who We Are, by General Huxtable Category:2018 deaths Category:1931 births Category:British generals
title: Charles Huxtable
